text: 2.24: Mt 28.5-6; Mk 16.6; Ru 24.5; FG 3.15; 4.10; 10.40; 13.30-31; 17.31; 1 Ko 15.15Ana rimgim, Fhe Bakɨme taagia ana khavgi. Ana fhura ana garim, ana rimgiap khurigi fhuvara, ana khaŋ muuŋgiap, ana za rimgip mba mbogar kɨv khurɨv shargirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Ana rimgi, rɨmrɨm ana suirarga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
